Questions.correct_ans_explanation: In addition to being a hands-on mom to six kids, Angelina Jolie acts and directs, promotes humanitarian causes that help other children around the world, and always manages to look sophisticated and drop-dead sexy when appropriate
Questions.question: Who is this?

Questions.correct_ans_explanation: Actress, producer, and singer (she had a metal band at one point!) Jada Pinkett Smith is definitely a role model for her kids. Jaden and Willow are both following in their famous parents’ footsteps—taking Hollywood by storm and inheriting Mom’s cool, edgy fashion sense.
Questions.question: Who is this?

Questions.correct_ans_explanation: Katie Holmes remains one of the chicest moms in entertainment. Proof: her upscale fashion line, Holmes & Yang, and her fashion-forward mini-me, Suri, who arguably has a better wardrobe than most adults.
Questions.question: Do you know who is this?
Who's this famous person?
Questions.correct_ans_explanation: Although Carrie Bradshaw wasn’t ready for motherhood with Mr. Big, style icon Sarah Jessica Parker has happily embraced the title with three children of her own.

Questions.question: Do you know who she is?
Questions.correct_ans_explanation: New mom Sienna Miller knows how to make a stroller the most stylish accessory ever—just add a cropped fur coat, fun sunglasses, and leopard smoking shoes. We cannot wait to see baby Marlowe’s fashion future!

Questions.question: Identify this famous personality.
Questions.correct_ans_explanation: The fact that Jennifer Lopez scored her twins Max and Emme a freakin’ Gucci campaign is enough to give any Hollywood mom a stylish title. Her fashion and beauty empire and portfolio of legendary red-carpet moments don’t hurt though.
